texts.en:
Delia is 43 years old, married and has five children. Her spouse is a farmer and her partner in planting and harvesting rice to sell to traders. They also pay additional laborers who help them in the farming business. She usually gains about PHP 15,000 each harvest season, twice a year. 

Delia wants to improve her crop production. This is why she is now asking for a loan of PHP 20,000 to invest in buying farming inputs which will help ensure good nutrition to crops. She will buy fertilizers and pesticides. 

In the future, Delia hopes to keep achieving abundant harvests so she can build a reserve fund for her family's unexpected expenses and especially for their education.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and pesticides used in farming

loans.name: Samart's Group

texts.en:
Samart, 62 years old, lives in a rural area in the Sa Ang district, Kandal province. She is married and has one child. Samart and her husband have made a living by farming rice and planting cabbage for 33 years. The current business earns her about KHR 7,000 per day to support the family.

This is the third loan for Samart with Kiva’s partner, VisionFund. She fully repaid the past loans. She and her group member are applying for a loan. Samart, the leader, is going to use her portion to buy materials, such as a latrine bowl, tile and sewage draining, etc., to build a proper latrine. She hopes this loan will enable her family to have a healthy latrine for an improved life.

loans.use: to buy materials to build a proper latrine.

loans.name: Minh

texts.en:
Minh was born in 1976. She has two children who are learning at the 9th grade and 6th grade. Her husband grows rice to earn a living. 

Minh raises chickens and gets 3,000,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 5,000,000 VND per month.

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2007. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,528,000 VND to buy food for chickens. She always wants to earn more money for her family’s income and can help her children have good careers.

loans.use: to buy food for chickens.

loans.name: Noly

texts.en:
Noly, 43 years old, is from the forest region of Isabela. He is married with five children. Noly manages a farm together with his wife, Margie. 

To sustain the needs of his family, Noly is asking for a loan of 40,000 PHP to buy fertilizer and seeds for his farm. Farming is the only way they live. Noly hopes that someday he can put up a store in front of their house, so that they have a source of additional income.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seed for his farm.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 3 filhos, todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa da sua mãe e não sustenta mais ninguém para além de seus filhos.
É cabeleireira e possui um salão próprio e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos de cabelo, de beleza e extensões de cabelo para aumentar a quantidade de seu produto. 
No futuro deseja melhorar ainda mais o seu estabelecimento de forma a atrair mais a sua clientela, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
De momento não tem nenhum desafio para além de manter-se sempre saudável.
texts.en:
Elisa is single and the mother of 3 children, all of whom attend School. She lives in her mother's house and doesn't support anyone else other than her children.

She's a hairdresser and has her own salon. With this loan she plans to buy hair products, beauty products and hair extensions to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future Elisa wishes to improve her establishment even more so as to attract more clients. To this end she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

At this moment she doesn't have any challenges other than staying healthy.

loans.use: buy hair products, beauty products and hair extensions

loans.name: Mely

texts.en:
Mely is 62 years old and is married to Ignacio. At her age, Mely still works in livestock, raising pigs to earn income. From this business, she is able to earn about PHP 8,000 per head after fattening them. She is grateful that her income allows her to help sustain the daily needs of her family. She dreams of lifting her family from poverty, which is why she works hard at her hog raising business. 

Mely also wants to provide the necessities for her pigs. So, she is requesting a loan of PHP 45,000 to buy feed, vaccine, and vitamins for her pigs. She hopes this will make them fit and nourished to earn higher profits at selling time. Mely also hopes to grow her business to secure her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy feed, vaccine, and vitamins for her pigs

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos, alguns já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 netos que vivem com ela.
É comerciante vende frangos de corte e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, ração e vitaminas para aumentar a quantidade da sua criação e responder a demanda da sua clientela. 
No futuro deseja aumentar a produtividade adquirir mais experiencia no ramo de criação e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é a concorrência no mercado e controlar as doenças.
texts.en:
Hermelinda is married and the mother of 5 children, some of whom are already of age. She lives in her own house with her family and supports 2 grandchildren who live with her.

She's a trader and sells hens for slaughter. With this loan she plans to buy chicks, ration and vitamins to help increase her production and respond to her customers' demand.

In future, Hermelinda wishes to increase her production, obtain more experience in raising hens and improve her family's living conditions. To this end she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is the competition in the market and controlling diseases.

loans.use: buy chicks, ration and vitamins to help increase her production and respond to her customers' demand.

loans.name: Xuyen

texts.en:
Xuyen was born in 1983. She has three children. Her two older children are learning at primary school. Her younger child has just been born. Her husband is a building worker. She collects iron scrap to earn a living. Her income is about 3,000,000 VND. Her family’s total earnings are about 7,000,000 VND per month. 

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,080,000 VND to collect more iron scrap to recycle. She always wants to raise her children up well.

loans.use: to collect more iron scrap to recycle.

loans.name: Anh

texts.en:
Anh was born in 1983. She has two children who are learning at kindergarten and primary school. Her husband is a building worker. His income is about 4,000,000 Viet Nam Dongs (VND) per month.

Anh sells pork meat to earn a living. She earns 3,000,000 VND a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 7,000,000 VND per month.

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,080,000 VND to buy more pork meat to sell in the market. She always wants to let her children go to school until they completely higher education.

loans.use: to buy more pork meat to sell in the market.

loans.name: Bernard

texts.en:
Bernard is a proud farmer. He is 28 years old, married, and has one child. His main priority in life is to have a greater profit, so he could provide for all the needs of his family.

Bernard manages one hectare of rice field. He is thankful because his previous loan was used to improve his farmland, enabling him to obtain better profit. 

He would like to have continuous improvement of his farming business, so he is requesting additional capital, amounting to 40,000 PHP. This amount will be used to buy fertilizer and insecticide as well as to pay for the labor cost of transplanting and spraying his farmland. Bernard hopes to obtain this loan amount, so he could make his farmland more productive and profitable.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and insecticide as well as to pay for the labor cost of  transplanting and spraying his farmland.

loans.name: Mai

texts.en:
Mai was born in 1970. She has two children. Her older child is a soldier, and her younger child is in high school. Her husband sells dishes in the market and earns 3,000,000 VND per month. For the past 10 years, Mai has run a grocery store to earn a living, earning about 3,000,000 VND per month. Therefore, her family’s total earnings are about 6,000,000 VND per month. 
	
Mai has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2007. In the last cycle, she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,080,000 VND to buy noodles, rice, snacks, and sodas to sell in her grocery store. She always wants to enlarge her store and will use the anticipated profits to pay her child’s educational fees.

loans.use: to buy noodles, rice, snacks, and sodas to sell in her grocery store.

loans.name: Hai

texts.en:
Hai was born in 1962. She has two children. They are learning at secondary school and at the university. Her husband grows rice. 

To earn a living, Hai raises chickens. She gets 2,500,000 VND per month. Her family’s total earnings are about 4,500,000 VND per month. 

Hao has participated in the Center of Small Enterprise Development Assistance (SEDA) credit program since 2007. In the last cycle, she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. 

In this loan cycle, Hao would like to borrow 9,632,000 VND to buy chicken feed. She always wants to raise her children well, so they can get a job in the future.

loans.use: to buy chicken feed.

loans.name: Sérgio

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos, todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com sua família e sustenta os seus pais enviando dinheiro sempre que possível para despesas alimentares.
É técnico agro-pecuário. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar material de construção (cimento, chapas, barrotes, tijoleira, e outros) para dar continuidade a obra da sua casa. 
No futuro deseja concluir e mobilar a casa e crescer profissionalmente, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é o elevado custo de vida.
texts.en:
Sergio is married and the father of 2 children who both attend School, lives in his own house with his family and supports his parents by sending them money to help with food expenses whenever possible.

He works for a company producing crops and rearing animals. With this loan he plans to buy construction materials (cement, metal plates, beams, bricks and others) to continue the building work on his house.

In future he wishes to finish and furnish his home and grow professionally. To this end he commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is the high cost of living.

loans.use: buy construction materials (cement, metal plates, beams, bricks and others) to continue the building work on his house.

loans.name: Fernando

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 irmãos que vivem com ele.
É alfaiate, faz corte e costura de vestuário diverso e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar tecidos e outros acessórios diversos para a costura de vestuário e vender. 
No futuro deseja melhorar os seus serviços e criar uma sustentabilidade na sua actividade e melhorar as condições de sua residência, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir atrair mais clientes para afluir ao seu negócio com frequência.
texts.en:
Fernando is married and the father of 2 children who go to School, lives in his own house with his family and supports 2 brothers who live with him.

He's a tailor, tailoring various types of clothing and with this loan he plans to buy fabric and other accessories for sewing and selling clothing.

In future he hopes to improve his services and create some sustainability in his activity and improve the living conditions in his home. To this end he commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

His challenge is to attract more clients who become regulars.

loans.use: buy fabric and other accessories for sewing and selling clothing.

loans.name: Ngat

texts.en:
Ngat was born in 1976. She has two children, who are learning at primary and secondary school. Her husband is a building worker. His income is about 4,000,000 Vietnamese dong (VND) per month. Ngat sells clothes to earn a living. She gains 3,000,000 VND a month. Thus, her family’s total earnings are about 7,000,000 VND per month.

Ngat has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2007. In the last cycle, she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,080,000 VND to buy more clothes to sell in the market. She wants her children to go to school until they have earned a higher education.

loans.use: to buy more clothes to sell in the market.

loans.name: Thua

texts.en:
Thua was born in 1974. She has four children who are learning at university, high school, secondary school, and primary school. Her husband grows rice. 

Thua raises chickens to earn a living. She gains from it 2,500,000 Viet Nam dongs (VND) a month. Her family’s total earnings are about 5,000,000 VND per month.

She has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2008. In the last cycle she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,080,000 VND to buy food for her chickens. She always wants to let her children go to school till higher education and enlarge her farm of chickens.

loans.use: to buy food for chickens.

loans.name: Nafitália

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 1 filho que já frequenta a Escola, vive na casa dos pais e ajuda os seus pais que vivem com ela nas despesas de casa.
É comerciante e vende diversos produtos que adquire na Republica da África do sul. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (amendoim, óleo, bebidas alcoólicas, carne, sabão e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja abrir mais um estabelecimento comercial para aumentar o seu rendimento, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é voltar a Escola e elevar o seu nível académico.
texts.en:
Nafitália is single and the mother of 1 son who already goes to School. She lives in her parents' house and helps her parents with household expenses.

She's a trader and sells various products that she buys in the Republic of South Africa. With this loan she plans to buy products (peanuts, oil, alcoholic beverages, meat, soap and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

In future she hopes to open a commercial establishment to increase her income. To this end, she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

Her challenge is to go back to School and increase her level of education.

loans.use: buy products (peanuts, oil, alcoholic beverages, meat, soap and others) to increase the quantity of her stock.

loans.name: Lina

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de filhos já adultos e alguns já tem suas próprias famílias, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 4 netos que vivem com ela.
É negociante cria e vende frangos de corte e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, ração e vitaminas para aumentar a quantidade de sua criação e responder a procura de frango na sua zona. 
No futuro deseja apostar mais no seu negócio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
Diz não ter nenhum desafio
texts.en:
Lina is married and the mother of adult children, some of whom already have their own families. She lives in her own house with her family and supports 4 grandchildren who live with her.

She's a trade and raises hens for slaughter. With this loan she plans to buy chicks, rations and vitamins to increase the quantity of her production and respond to the demand for chicken in her area.

In future Lina hopes to grow her business and to this end she commits to duly paying off the loan in order to solicit further loans from Hluvuku.

She says she has no challenges.

loans.use: buy chicks, rations and vitamins to increase the quantity of her production and respond to the demand for chicken in her area.

loans.name: Leopoldo

texts.en: Leopoldo, 39 years old, is married to Charibel and is from the village of the Benito Soliven Province of Isabela. He is engaged in farming to provide for the needs of his family. Leopoldo is asking for a loan of Php 30,000 to to purchase two sacks of seed and fertilizer for his farm. He hopes that someday he can renovate their house for a better living condition.

loans.use: to purchase two sacks of seed and fertilizer for his farm.

loans.name: Telma

texts.pt:
Solteira e mãe de 2 filhos que frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com seus filhos e não sustenta mais ninguém.
É negociante e dona do próprio negócio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (peixe, frangos, óleo, feijão, e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja fazer crescer o seu negócio e obter mais rendimento, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é conseguir fundos para realizar os seus projectos.
texts.en:
Telma is single and has two children who attend school. She lives with her family in a house she owns and doesn't support anyone else.
She's in retail and owns her own business selling foodstuffs. With the current loan she intends to purchase goods (fish, chicken, cooking oil, beans, etc.) in order to stock up and diversify her merchandise.
In the future she wishes to expand her business and increase her profits. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is obtaining funds to accomplish her projects.

loans.use: to purchase fish, chicken, cooking oil, beans, etc. for selling.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.pt:
Viúva e mãe de 2 filhos já maiores de idade, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta 2 netos que vivem com ela.
É comerciante vende frangos de corte e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar pintos, ração e vitaminas para aumentar a quantidade da sua criação e responder a demanda da sua clientela. 
No futuro deseja aumentar a produtividade adquirir mais experiencia no ramo de criação e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é controlar as doenças que atacam as aves e aumentar a produtividade.
texts.en:
Rosa is a widow and has two children who are already adults. She lives with her family in a house she owns and also supports two grandchildren who live with her.
She's in retail and sells broiler chickens. With the current loan she intends to purchase chicks, feed and vitamins in order to increase the quantity of the chickens she raises and meet the demand from her customers.
In the future she wishes to increase productivity, gain more experience in the animal raising business and improve her family's living conditions. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is increasing productivity and controlling the diseases that affect the birds.

loans.use: to purchase chicks, feed and vitamins for raising broiler chickens.

loans.name: Telma

texts.pt:
Casada e mãe de 5 filhos, todos a frequentar Escola na cidade de Maputo, ela vive na casa própria com o seu esposo e sustenta os filhos enviando dinheiro para despesas correntes e conta com ajuda do seu marido.
É comerciante vende produtos diversos e com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (frangos, óleo, amendoim sabão, peixe e outros) para aumentar e diversificar a sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja montar um negócio mais rentável de forma mais profissional para poder subir o seu rendimento, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é apostar na Educação dos folhos ate atingir o nível superior.
texts.en:
Telma is married and has five children, all of whom attend school in the town of Maputo. She lives with her husband in a house she owns. She supports her children by sending money for their daily expenses and also gets help from her husband.
She's in retail and sells various products. With the current loan she intends to purchase goods (chickens, cooking oil, peanuts, soap, fish, etc.) in order to stock up and diversify her merchandise.
In the future she wishes to start a more profitable business in a more professional way, so that she can increase her profits. For that reason she pledges to repay the loan as scheduled so she can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge she faces is investing in her children's education all the way to a college degree.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, cooking oil, peanuts, soap, fish, etc. for selling.

loans.name: Abdul R.'s Group

texts.en:
Pictured above are primary school teachers from one of the schools in Waterloo, a small town near Sierra Leone’s capital city, Freetown. This group of teachers, like their colleagues in SMT's other operational areas, has come to SMT for "salary loans." With the help of these loans, they are empowered to meet certain financial challenges that their salaries, alone, do not let them meet. With the help of a loan they can meet their immediate financial needs, and at the end of each month they can repay the loan, using their monthly salaries. 

Abdul is the leader of this group of teachers. The 45-year-old is a native of Manolo Koya village. He is married to a businesswoman and the couple has four children. Abdul has been a professional teacher for many years. He has requested this loan in order to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to pay school fees for his children

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Rosa  tiene 65 años de edad tiene 05 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes ,la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azucar, leche, golosinas, gaseosas entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo en su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia trabaja de lunes a sábado durante el día ,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar mercadería como gaseosas para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member is part of the Rosita de Los Angeles communal bank, which is in the San Sebastian district of the province and department of Cusco.

Member Rosa is 65 years old and is married with five children.  She goes between her everyday household activities and running her grocery store.  She sells different types of products, such as rice, sugar, milk, candy and soda pop, among other things.  Rosa has had her business for some time and it's going well thanks to the effort that she puts in every day.  She works during the day, from Monday to Saturday. This member is responsible and hard-working and with this work is supporting her family.

Rosa needs a loan to buy merchandise, such as soda pop, for her store. 

Rosa is very grateful for the loan given to her and promises to make her repayments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like soda pop for her business.

loans.name: Muhammad

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 3 filhos, todos frequentam a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 1 sobrinho que vive com ele.
É pastor e dono de negócio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (arroz, amendoim, óleo, feijão, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja fazer crescer o seu negócio e melhorar as condições de vida da sua família, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é garantir a formação dos seus filhos até atingir o nível superior.
texts.en:
Muhammad is married and has three children, all of whom attend school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports a nephew who lives with him.
He's a shepherd and owns a business selling foodstuffs. With the current loan he intends to purchase goods (rice, peanuts, cooking oil, beans, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future he wishes to expand his business and improve his family's living conditions. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is ensuring his children's education all the way to a college degree.

loans.use: to purchase rice, peanuts, cooking oil, beans, etc. for selling, so that he can stock up with merchandise.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Susana tiene 31 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes ,la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azucar, leche, golosinas,gaseosas entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo en su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia trabaja de lunes a sábado durante el día ,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar mercadería como leche y aceite para su negocio y para algunos gastos personales.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "Rosita de Los Angeles".  The bank is located in the district of San Sebastián, in the province of Cusco,  and in the subdivision of Cusco.

Susana is thirty-one years old, has two children, and lives with her partner.  She alternates her daily activities between tasks in her grocery store business.  She sells different types of products, like rice, sugar, milk, candies, and carbonated drinks, among others.  She has a good time in her business, which is going well thanks to the determination she puts in every day.  She works Monday to Saturday during the day.  She is a responsible and determined individual, feeling that through this she is able to move her family forward.

Susana is requesting a loan to buy merchandise like milk and oil for her business, and also to cover some personal expenses.  She is thankful for the loan granted to her and promises to comply with the set payments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise like milk and oil for her business, and also to cover some personal expenses.

loans.name: Cuc

texts.en:
Cuc was born in 1984. She has four children. The two older children are learning at the second and fifth grades. The two younger children are five and three years old. Her husband is a carpenter. 

Cuc earns 4,000,000 Vietnamese dong (VND) a month selling sausages. Her family’s total earnings are about 8,000,000 VND per month.

Cuc has participated in SEDA's credit program since 2007. In the last cycle, she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,528,000 VND to buy more ingredients to make sausages to sell in the market. 

She always wants to earn more income for her family and to enable her children have good careers.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients to make sausages to sell in the market.

loans.name: Ronald

texts.es:
EL socio pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOS ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio Ronald tiene 22 años de edad y es soltero, él socio alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de servicio de vulcanizadora, él socio lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, el socio realiza arreglos de llantas en su negocio, el trabaja de lunes a sábado durante el día, el socio es una persona responsable y emprendedor siendo de esta forma que el socio sale adelante.

El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de una compresora de aire para su negocio.

El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The “ROSITA DE LOS ANGELES” communal bank is located in the San Sebastián in the Cusco province and department.

Ronald is 22 years old and single.  He has a tire shop, has been doing this for some time, and things are going well for him, thanks to the effort he puts in each day.  His business repairs tires and he works from Monday to Saturday.  He is a responsible entrepreneur and gets ahead through this business.

He is asking for a loan to buy an air compressor for his business.  He is very grateful for the loan and promises to make his payments on schedule.

loans.use: to buy an air compressor.

loans.name: Judas

texts.pt:
Casado e pai de 1 filho que frequenta a Escola, vive na casa própria com a sua família e sustenta mais 1 irmão que vive com ele.
É padeiro e dono de negócio de venda de produtos alimentares. Com o presente empréstimo pretende comprar produtos (refrescos, sumos, arroz, amendoim, óleo, feijão, e outros) para aumentar a quantidade da sua mercadoria. 
No futuro deseja fazer crescer o seu negócio e construir um estabelecimento próprio, para tal compromete-se a pagar devidamente o empréstimo para solicitar mais a Hluvuku. 
O desafio é reunir esforços para realizar os seus projectos.
texts.en:
Judas is married and has a son who attends school. He lives with his family in a house he owns and also supports a brother who lives with him.
He's a baker and owns a business selling foodstuffs. With the current loan he intends to purchase goods (refreshments, juice, rice, peanuts, cooking oil, beans, etc.) in order to stock up with merchandise.
In the future he wishes to expand his business and build his own store. For that reason he pledges to repay the loan as scheduled, so he can request more loans from Hluvuku.
The challenge he faces is summoning up efforts in order to accomplish his projects.

loans.use: to purchase refreshments, juice, rice, peanuts, cooking oil, beans, etc. for selling, so that he can stock up with merchandise.

loans.name: Minh

texts.en:
Minh was born in 1967. She has two children, one is a student, the other a worker. Her husband is a security man. 

To earn a living, Minh has a grocery store. She gains from it 3,000,000 VND per month. Her family’s total earnings are about 10,000,000 VND per month. 

Minh has participated in the Center of Small Enterprise Development Assistance (SEDA) credit program since 2007. In the last cycle, she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time.

In this loan cycle, she would like to borrow 10,080,000 VND to buy canned food, rice, beer, and towels to sell in her grocery store. Her dream is to upgrade and enlarge her grocery store.

loans.use: to buy canned food, rice, beer, and towels to sell in her grocery store.

loans.name: Ty

texts.en:
Ty was born in 1981. She has three children. They are learning at secondary school and primary school. Ty and her husband sell plastic bags in the market. His monthly income is 4,500,000 VND. She has done her job for nine years. Her income is about 5,000,000 VND per month. Her family’s total earnings are approximately 9,500,000 VND per month. 

Ty has participated in the Center of Small Enterprise Development Assistance (SEDA) credit program since 2007. In the last cycle, she borrowed 9,632,000 VND and repaid the loan on time. 

In this loan cycle, Ty would like to borrow 10,080,000 VND to make plastic bags and plastic furniture to sell. She always wants to enlarge her workshop and she can use the profit from the sales to pay for her children’s education fees.

loans.use: to make plastic bags and plastic furniture to sell.

loans.name: Aviany

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Aviany  tiene 37 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de tienda de abarrotes ,la socia vende diferentes tipos de productos como arroz, azucar, leche,golosinas,gaseosas entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo en su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia trabaja de lunes a sábado durante el día ,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar mercadería como arroz y azucar.
La socia sale en la foto con uno de sus hijos.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
She is a member of the “ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES” communal bank, located in the San Sebastián district in the province and department of Cusco.

Aviany is 37 years old, married, and has two children.  She has a grocery store where she sells different types of products such as rice, sugar, milk, snacks, and other things and has been doing this for some time.  Things are going well for her, thanks to the daily effort she puts into her business.  She works during the day, Monday through Saturday and is a very responsible and dedicated woman who works to get her family ahead.

She is asking for this loan to buy merchandise such as sugar and rice.

One of her children is with her in the photograph.

She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to stock her store.

loans.name: Rosario

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Rosario tiene 30 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de huevos ella vende de forma ambulatoria repartiendo su mercadería a sus clientes que le solicitan, a la vez la socia vende salchipapas por  la noche, ya son varios años que se dedica  a este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar insumos para su negocio como aceite, papas y para algunos gastos personales.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
She is a member of the “ROSITA DE LOS ANGELES” communal bank, located in the San Sebastián district, within the Cusco province and department.

Rosario is 30 years old and lives with her husband.  She sells eggs on foot, delivering her merchandise to customers who request them.  She also sells salchipapas in the evening and has been doing this for a number of years.  Things are going well for her thanks to the daily effort she puts into her business.

She is asking for this loan to buy cooking oil, potatoes, and for some personal expenses.

She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy ingerdients and some personal expenses.

loans.name: Oscar Antonio

texts.es:
Oscar tiene 33 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos. Él trabaja como molinero desde hace 10 años se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. para dirigirse a su trabajo que se encuentra a un kilómetro de su casa. Es llegando a su lugar de trabajo empieza a afilar los discos del molino para abrir el negocio a las 6:00 a.m. hasta las 4:00 p.m. Este negocio no es de él; pero recibe un pago por el trabajo que realiza. Mientras tanto su esposa atiende en su casa a otros clientes ya que tienen un molino que funciona con diesel. 


El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para instalar la energía eléctrica en su vivienda para hacer funcionar su molino de diesel con energía eléctrica. Su deseo, es construir su casa de ladrillo ya que en la que vive es de adobe y se filtra el agua.
texts.en:
Oscar is 33 years old, married, and has three children.  He works as a grain grinder and has done so for 10 years.  Every day he gets up at 5:00 am to go to work, one kilometer from his home.  Upon arrival he begins by sharpening his mill discs so that he can open from 6:00 am to 4:00 pm.  This is not his business, but he is paid for his work.  At the same time, his wife tends to other customers in their home, where they have another diesel-powered mill.

He will use the money from this loan, through Fundación Campo, to run electricity into his home, so that the mill can work without diesel.  He wants to build a brick home, as his current home is made of adobe and it leaks.

loans.use: to run electricity for his mill.

loans.name: Agustina Nancy

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Agustina  tiene 36 años de edad tiene 01 hijo y es separada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de desayunos ella vende lo que son quinua, kiwicha, quinua con manzana entre otros, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio ,la socia vende en uno de los paraderos  de servicio urbano, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar insumos para su negocio como quinua, leche, azucar entre otros y para algunos gastos personales.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
She is a member of the “ROSITA DE LOS ANGELES” communal bank, located in the San Sebastián district, within the Cusco province and department.

Agustina is 36 years old, is separated and has one son.  She sells breakfast items, such as quinua, kiwicha, and quinua with apples among other things.  She has been doing this for years and things are going well for her, thanks to the daily effort she puts into her business.  She is a responsible and determined woman who sells in one of the urban centers and gets her family ahead in this way.

She is asking for this loan in order to buy ingredients such as quinua, milk, and sugar among other things; also for some personal expenses.  She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy ingredients.

loans.name: Las Palmeras Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS PALMERAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Andrea ella es casada y tiene 45 años y tiene 3 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de venta de chicha, es una bebida a base de maíz, ella vende la chicha en su casa y también la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de tejidos de chompas de alpaca, ella distribuye a las diferentes tiendas donde venden chompas, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m,la socia en su negocio de venta de chicha tiene 7 años y en el negocio de venta de chompas tiene 5 años y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender las chompas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar lanas, palitos de tejer y hilos.
Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de artesanía, negocio de tejidos de chompas, negocio de servicio de taxi y negocio de restaurant.

La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These are members of the “LAS PALMERAS” communal bank, located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

Andrea is 45 years old, married, and has three children.  She sells chicha, a fermented corn based drink, out of her home.  She also sells knitted alpaca sweaters and delivers them to different stores where they sell them.  She works from 8:00 am to 6:00 pm and has had her chicha business for seven years and her sweater business for five.  Things are going well and her dream is to have her own store where she can sell the sweaters.  She is asking for this loan to buy yarn, knitting needles, and thread.

She is grateful to those who form part of this dream and is committed to making her payments on time.

The other members sell arts and crafts, knit sweaters, drive a taxi, and run a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Susana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Susana tiene 32 años de edad tiene 03 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de lavado de carros ,la socia trabaja años en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio , a la vez la socia cuenta con un carro el cual brinda el servicio de taxi siendo su pareja el que maneja el carro ,la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante  a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para realizar el mantenimiento de su carro como el cambio de aceite.
La socia sale en la foto con una de sus hijas.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
The “ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES” communal bank, located in the San Sebastián district within the Cusco province and department.

Susana is 32 years old and has three children.  She is married, has a car wash, and has been in this business for several years.  Things are going well for her thanks to the daily effort she puts into her business.  She also has a car that she uses to provide taxi services; her husband drives it.  She is a very responsible and dedicated woman who gets her family ahead in this manner.

She is asking for a loan in order to do maintenance on her car and do an oil change.  She appears with one of her daughters in the image.

She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to perform maintenance on her taxi.

loans.name: Velia Liliana

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Velia tiene 42 años de edad tiene 02 hijos  y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de compra y venta de materiales de construcción como bloquetas, piedras, cemento entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar materiales como cemento para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
She is a member of the “ROSITA DE LOS ANGELES” communal bank, located in the San Sebastián district, within the Cusco province and department.

Velia is 42 years old, married, and has two children.  She buys and sells building materials such as cinder blocks, stones, cement, and other things.  She has been doing this for a long time and things are going well thanks to the daily effort she puts into her business.  She is a hardworking and dedicated woman who gets her family ahead in this way.

She will use the money from this loan to buy supplies such as cement for her business.  She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Jorge Antonio

texts.es:
El socio Jorge Antonio se dedica al negocio de transporte,el socio tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene 6 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el socio por medio de este negocio quiere salir adelante,el sueño del socio es terminar de construir.El socio solicita el credito para comprar cemento,yeso,arena y clavos para terminar de construir su casa.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The communal bank member, Jorge Antonio, makes a living working as a taxi driver. He has a car and provides taxi service from 8 a.m. until 10 p.m. He has been working in this business for the past 6 years and it is going very well. He hopes to be able to get ahead as a result of his business. Jorge's dream is to finish building his home. He has requested a loan to buy cement, plaster, sand and nails to finish the construction of his home. 

Jorge is very pleased with the loan he is receiving, and he promises to make his payments on time.

loans.use: to buy cement, plaster, sand and nails to finish the construction of his house.

loans.name: Magdalena

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Magdalena  tiene 37 años de edad tiene 04 hijos y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de pasamanería  como venta de escobillas, pasadores, pasta dental entre otros, la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día su negocio, la socia vende en uno de los mercados de Cusco, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante  a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar mercadería para su negocio como pasadores, escobillas, detergentes entre otros.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Magdalena belongs to the Rosita de Loa Angeles community bank located in San Sebastian, province and department of Cusco, Peru. She is a 37-year-old married mother of four children and makes a living selling brushes, pins, tooth paste and other items. She has had the business for a good amount of time, and it is going very well thanks to the hard work she puts in every day. She sells at one of the markets in Cusco. Magdalena is a responsible and hardworking person, and in this way she makes headway for her family. She is requesting the loan to purchase merchandise for her business, such as pins, brushes, detergents and other items. She feels grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: To purchase pins, brushes, detergents and other items.

loans.name: Fabian

texts.es:
El socio Fabian se dedica al negocio de tranpsorte,el socio tiene un carro que hace servicio de taxi,el socio trabaja en las diferentes calles de la ciudad desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m,el socio ya tiene 8 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño del socio es tener un carro nuevo.El socio solicita el credito para comprar repuestos para su carro.

El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The borrower, Fabian, works in the transport business. He has a car that he uses as a taxi service. He works on different city streets from 7:00AM until 8:00PM. He has already been in this business for eight years and it is going very well. His dream is to have a new car. He is asking for a loan to pay for spare parts for his car.

He is happy about the loan and he promises to complete his payment according to schedule.

loans.use: to pay for spare parts for his car that he uses as a taxi service

loans.name: Miguel Angel

texts.es:
EL socio pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOS ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio Miguel Ángel tiene 19 años de edad  y es soltero, él socio alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de cafetín escolar, el socio vende lo que son golosinas, tortas, gaseosas, empanadas, pasteles entre otros, él socio lleva poco tiempo en su negocio pero nos comenta que le va bien ,el socio desea que su negocio crezca con el tiempo, a la vez el socio acaba de empezar a estudiar ingles  el se siente bien y espera poder terminar sus estudios,el socio es una persona responsable y emprendedor siendo de esta forma que el sale adelante.

El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de mercadería como golosinas y gaseosas para su negocio.

El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
He is a member of the “ROSITA DE LOS ANGELES” communal bank, located in the San Sebastián district, within the Cusco province and department.

Miguel Ángel is 19 years old, single, and has a school café where he sells snacks, sandwiches, soft drinks, empanadas, and cakes among other things.  He hasn’t been doing this very long, but things are going well and he wants to grow his business over time.  He just began studying English and he feels good about being able to complete his studies.  He is a responsible and enterprising man who wants to get ahead this way.

He is asking for this loan to buy merchandise for his business.  He is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Beatriz tiene 32 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es conviviente, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de hacer llamadas telefónicas tanto nacionales como locales, a la vez la socia se dedica al negocio de venta de ropa ,la socia vende en uno de los mercados de Cusco, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona 
responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar casacas para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
Beatriz belongs to the "Rosita de los Angeles" communal bank, which is located in the San Sebastián district in the province and department of Cusco.

Beatriz is 32 years old. She has 2 children and lives with her partner. She alternates her daily activities with her business making national and local telephone calls, and at the same time she works at her business selling clothes. She sells her clothes in one of the markets in Cusco. Beatriz has been in this business for years which is going well thanks to the effort she puts into her business.

Beatriz is a responsible and hard-working person, which is how she keeps her family going. She is asking for this loan so that she can buy jackets for her business. She is grateful for the loan given to her and is committed to making her repayments on time.

loans.use: to buy jackets for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy corn and phone cards to sell

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Celia tiene 44 años de edad tiene 02 hijos y es separada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de venta de desayunos ella vende lo que son quinua, quinua con leche, quinua con manzana entre otros, la socia lleva años en este negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio ,la socia vende en uno de los paraderos  de servicio urbano por las mañanas desde las 06:00am hasta las 10:00am aproximadamente, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar insumos para su negocio como quinua, leche, azúcar entre otros.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Celia belongs to the Rosita De Los Angeles community bank located in the district of San Sebastian, province and department of Cusco, Peru. She is 44 years old, separated from her husband and has two children. She makes a living selling breakfasts like quinoa, quinoa with milk, quinoa with apples and more. She has had this business for a number of years, and it is going very well thanks to the hard work she puts in every day. She sells at one of the local bus stops every morning from approximately 6 to 10. She is responsible and hardworking, and in this way makes headway for her family. She is requesting the loan to purchase ingredients like quinoa, milk, sugar and other items. She is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase quinoa, milk, sugar and other items.

loans.name: Dúo Bendiciones De Patzanes Group

texts.es:
BENDICION DE PATZANES
Este dúo lo forma doña Aldina quien se dedica a la venta de gallinas y huevos, desde hace 6 años. Es casada tiene 3 hijos y sus hijos están estudiando en la escuela y está solicitando este crédito para comprar gallinas porque las que tiene ya dejaron de poner huevos y las tiene que vender a menos precio y las ponedoras salen un poco más caro,  espera que fape  pueda apoyarla como siempre lo ha hecho.
texts.en:
BENDICION DE PATZANES

Aldina is part of this Duo.  She’s worked selling chickens and eggs for six years.  She’s married and has three children; her children are attending school and she’s requesting this loan to buy chickens because the ones she has have stopped laying eggs and she has to sell them at reduced price and laying hens are more expensive.  She hopes Fape will be able to help her like it’s always done.

loans.use: to buy egg-laying hens.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOA ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

La socia Graciela  tiene 46 años de edad tiene 03 hijos  y es casada, la socia alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de compra y venta de materiales de construcción como bloquetas, piedras, cemento entre otros, la socia trabaja en su negocio conjuntamente con su esposo,la socia lleva buen tiempo en este su negocio el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su negocio, la socia es una persona responsable  siendo de esta forma que la socia saca adelante a su familia.

La socia solicita el crédito para comprar materiales como bloquetas para su negocio.

La socia se siente agradecida por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en: Graciela is 46 years old and belongs to the Rosita De Loa Angeles community bank located in the district of San Sebastian, province and department of Cusco, Peru. She is a 46-year-old married mother of three children, and she makes a living buying and selling construction supplies like bricks, stones, cement and other items. She has worked in her business alongside her husband for a good amount of time, and it is going very well thanks to the hard work she puts in every day. Graciela is a responsible person who makes headway for her family. She is requesting the loan to purchase bricks for her business. She is grateful for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase construction supplies like bricks.

loans.name: Patococha  (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Patococha se encuentra constituido por 8 socias y 1 socio quienes son miembros de una comunidad en la parroquia La Victoria del Portete, que se encuentra ubicada al Sur de la ciudad de Cuenca, provincia del Azuay. Tiene una superficie de 203,77 Km2; esta parroquia representa el 5,67% aproximadamente de la superficie del cantón Cuenca. Con temperaturas que son constantes a lo largo del año desde los 3º en la parte alta del Páramo hasta encontrarse con un clima menos frío y húmedo con temperaturas de 18º en la parte baja de la parroquia. Su gente es amable, gentil y su mayor orgullo es el de conservar aun su cultura y tradiciones, trabajan a diario para sacar adelante a sus familias.

Una de las socias de este grupo es la Señora. María Graciela, tiene 53 años de edad, es divorciada pero en su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos, cinco de ellos son casados y viven independientes, su único hijo soltero estudia en una universidad de la ciudad, la casa en la que vive es propia.
 
Ella se dedica al trabajo del campo como es la ganadería, la leche que obtiene de su ganado la vende, también cría pollos, cerdos y cuyes, siembra sus terrenos y lo que  cosecha es para el consumo de su hogar, hay veces que le llaman para que trabaje como jornalera, todas estas actividades le dan la oportunidad de mejorar su estabilidad económica.
 
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de abono para mejorar sus potreros y también va a realizar en la compra de pollos.
 
Su sueño es tener un negocio rentable como un restaurante.
texts.en:
Patococha Communal Bank is comprised of eight women and one man, members of the La Victoria del Portete community in the south of the city of Cuenca in the province of Azuay.  This parish covers 203.77 square kilometers, approximately 5.67%of Cuenca Canton.  With constant temperatures throughout the year, from 3ºC in the high plain to a less cold and humid climate with temperatures of 18ºC in the low part of the parish.  The people there are pleasant and courteous, and their greatest pride is that they still preserve their culture and traditions.  They work every day to get their families ahead. 

One of the members of this group is María, 53.  She's divorced but had six children in her marriage, five of whom are married and live on their own; her only single child studies in a university in the city.  The house she lives in is her own.

She makes a living working in the field, in ranching.  She sells the milk she gets from her cows.  She also raises chickens, pigs, and guinea pigs.  She plants her fields, and what she harvests is for home consumption.  Sometimes she's called to work as a day laborer.  All these jobs give her the opportunity to improve her financial stability.

She's going to invest her new loan in buying fertilizer to improve her fields.  She's also going to buy chickens.

Her dream is to have a profitable business, such as a restaurant.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and chickens

loans.name: Silvia

texts.es:
La socia Silvia se dedica al negocio de venta de ropa,la socia vende pantalones,blusas,chompas y polos,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,ella trabaja en forma independiente llevando a lugares como amigas o otras instituciones,la socia ya tiene 9 años en este negocio y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la ropa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pantalones,blusas,chompas y polos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Silvia sells clothing such as pants, blouses, sweaters, and polo shirts.  She works 8:00 am to 7:00 pm on her own, and delivers to friends and other institutions.  She has been doing this for nine years and things are going well for her.  She would like to have her own store someday, where she can sell clothing.  She is asking for this loan to buy pants, blouses, sweaters, and polo shirts.

She is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Santiago

texts.es:
EL socio pertenece al banco comunal ROSITA DE LOS ANGELES, el banco está ubicado en el distrito de San Sebastián, provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio Santiago  tiene 27 años de edad ,01 hijo y es conviviente, él socio alterna sus actividades diarias con su negocio de maestro constructor, el socio lleva años ejerciendo esta actividad el cual le va bien gracias al empeño que le pone cada día a su trabajo, él socio trabaja para las distintas obras que se realizan las cuales solicitan sus servicios, el socio es una persona responsable y empeñoso siendo de eta forma que el  socio saca adelante  a su familia.

El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de materiales para su trabajo como madera.

El socio se siente agradecido por el crédito otorgado y se compromete a cumplir con sus cuotas establecidas.
texts.en:
He is a member of the “ROSITA DE LOS ANGELES” communal bank, located in the San Sebastián district, within the Cusco province and department.

Santiago is 27 years old, married, and has a son.  He is a master builder and has been doing this for many years.  Things are going well for him, thanks to the daily effort he puts into his work.  He works on different projects and his talents are well sought after.  He is responsible and dedicated and gets his family ahead in this way.

He is asking for this loan so that he can buy supplies, such as lumber.  He is grateful for the loan and is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Dúo Luchando Por Nuestros Sueños Group

texts.es:
DÚO LUCHANDO POR NUESTROS SUEÑOS
Está a cargo de la señora Edilma Isabel, quien tiene dos hijos varones de 8 años y 3 años, ella tiene 32 años de edad y cuenta con el apoyo incondicional de su esposo y sigue cosechando metas en su vida. el negocio de la tortillería es muy bonita, ya que siempre es visitada por sus clientes en su casa donde ella tiene la venta. Hace unos días se celebro la feria de su aldea y ella tuvo muy bonitas venta con la comida que vendió,y ahora que se aproximan las fiestas navideñas a parte de su tortillería desea invertir en la compra por mayor de maíz por quintal para tener mejor ganancia, y en la compra de leña por camionada que se paga menos y se obtiene más leña. Ella nos dice que ya tiene algunos pedidos de tortilla pero el maíz que tiene en casa no le alcanza ya que también tiene que hacer unas entregas de tamales para las fiestas navideñas. Esta Solicitando este credito para la compra de maiz, y para la compra de leña por mayor.
texts.en:
"DÚO LUCHANDO POR NUESTROS SUEÑOS" group is driven by Edilma Isabel.  She has two sons; one is eight years old and the other is three.  She is thirty-two years old and counts on the unconditional support of her husband in following and achieving her goals in life.

Her business in making and selling tortillas is very lovely.  She is always visited by her clients at home where she does the selling.  A few days ago, they celebrated the festival of her village and she had great sales with the food she sold.  Now that the Christmas festivities are approaching, she wishes to invest in the wholesale purchase of corn by the sack in order to have better profits, and also in the purchase of firewood by the truck load; through this, she is able to pay less and get more firewood.

She tells us that she already has some tortilla orders, but the corn that she has in the house is not enough.  She also has to make some tamale deliveries for the Christmas festivities.  

She is asking for a loan in order to buy corn and to also buy firewood wholesale.

loans.use: to buy corn and also firewood wholesale to sell.

location.town: Aldea Vista Hermosa, San Pedro Sacatepequez

loans.name: Marina

texts.es:
La socia Marina se dedica al negocio de venta de artesanias como mantas y telares,la socia tambien se dedica al negocio de venta de ropa como pantalones,blusas,chompas,casacas y polos,ella trae la mercaderia de lugares como Arequipa y Lima,la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m,la socia tiene en su negocio de artesania y venta de ropa tiene 7 años y le va muy bien,el sueño de la socia es tener un local donde pueda vender la ropa.La socia solicita el credito para comprar pantalones,blusas y polos.

La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Marina works selling artisanal crafts such as blankets and textiles. She also works at the business of selling clothes such as pants, blouses, sweaters, jackets and t-shirts. She brings the merchandise from places such as Arequipa and Lima. She works from  8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m. at her businesses selling artisanal crafts and clothes for 7 years and it is going very well for her. Her dream is to have a locale where she can sell the clothes. She is asking for the loan to buy pants, blouses and t-shirts.

She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments.

loans.use: to buy pants, blouses and t-shirts.

loans.name: María Manuela

texts.es:
La Señora. María se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal Feria Libre, vive por la parroquia de Ricuarte en la ciudad de Cuenca, Ricuarte es una parroquia que se destaca por su sabor ya que preparan los más ricos platos típicos, su gente es amable, gentil y mantienen su costumbres, cuenta con varios lugares para admirar la belleza de sus paisajes y disfrutar de momentos de sano esparcimiento.

Doña María tiene 37 años de edad, es madre soltera de 2 hijos de 10 y 7 años de edad que están estudiando en una escuelita de la ciudad. No tiene casa propia por lo que vive arrendando.

La Señora María es comerciante ambulante de frutas, trabaja diariamente en un mercado de la ciudad sin un horario fijo, también hay días que se dedica al arreglo de viviendas, esta actividad la realiza después de sus ventas en el mercado. 

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de frutas para continuar con el negocio.
 
Su meta es tener su casa propia.
texts.en:
María is on her second loan, which is with the communal bank Feria Libre. She lives in the parish of Ricuarte in the city of Cuenca. Ricuarte is a parish that stands out by its flavor, since the people prepare the tastiest traditional dishes. Its people are kind and courteous, and they maintain their customs. There are many places to admire the beauty of its countrysides and enjoy moments of healthy relaxation.

María is 37 years old and is the single mother of two children (10 and 7) who are studying in a small city school. She does not have her own house and therefore rents a place to live in. María is a street vendor of fruit, and she works daily in the city market without a fixed schedule. There are also days in which she does home repair, an activity she performs after her sales in the market. She is going to invest her loan in the purchase of fruit in order to continue her business. Her goal is to have her own home.

loans.use: To buy fruit.

loans.name: María Manuela

texts.es:
La Señora. María es socia fundadora del banco comunal Feria Libre, es socia desde hace 14 años. Vive por la parroquia de Cumbe en Cuenca, lugar que goza de una accidentada geografía la que le da paisajes hermosos, su gente aun mantienen su cultura y tradiciones de sus padres, se dedican a laborar en la agricultura, crianza de animales y comercio.

Doña María tiene 60 años de edad, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 9 hijos, 8 de ellos son casados y viven independientes, su hijo soltero estudia en un colegio de la localidad. Su esposo labora como jornalero, la casa en la que viven es propia. 

La Señora María tiene un local propio en donde se dedica a la venta de verduras, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 5 años y trabaja de domingo a domingo sin un horario fijo, en su casa se dedica a la cría de cuyes, gallinas y cerdos, también trabaja en la agricultura y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su casa y también lo vende. 

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de hortalizas para continuar con su negocio. 

Su meta es seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
María is a founding member of Feria Libre Communal Bank.  She has been a member for 14 years.  She lives in the parish of Cumbe in Cuenca, a place of rugged geography and pretty scenery.  The people there still maintain the culture and traditions of their parents, and they work in agriculture, raising animals, and in business.

María, 60, is married and has conceived nine children, eight of whom are married and live on their own.  Her single son studies in a school in the town.  Her husband works as a day laborer.  The house they live in is their own.

María has her own place where she makes a living selling vegetables.  She has done this work for five years and she works every day without a fixed schedule.  At home she raises guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs.  She also works in agriculture; what she harvests is for home consumption as well as to sell.

She's going to invest her new loan in buying vegetables to continue with her business.

Her goal is to continue growing in her business.

loans.use: to buy vegetables

loans.name: Aurelia Beatriz

texts.es:
La Señora Aurelia se encuentra en su segundo crédito que realiza en el banco comunal Sector 3 Marías, vive por una comunidad que  pertenece a la parroquia de Turi en Cuenca, Turi viene del vocablo indígena "kuri" que significa oro, tiene la conformación típica de los asentamientos rurales de la región: la presencia de la plaza, la iglesia y las edificaciones ubicadas en torno a los hitos urbanos son dignos de visitar, por su belleza arquitectónica, su gente aun mantienen vivas las llamas de sus culturas y tradiciones.

La Señora Aurelia está casada y tiene 42 años de edad, en su unión conyugal ha concebido 6 hijos de 21, 18, 15, 14, 9, y 4 años de edad, sus tres primeros hijos trabajan y estudian a distancia el colegio, su cuarta hija estudia en el colegio, su quinto hijo está estudiando en una escuelita de la localidad y su ultimo hijo pasa en la casa. Su esposo es de profesión chofer, la casa en la que viven es el fruto del trabajo conyugal.

Doña Aurelia pasa la mayor parte de su tiempo en casa al cuidado de su familia y lo para aportar la economía de su hogar se dedica a cultivar sus tierras, las hortalizas que cosecha las vende, también cría animales como vacas, pollos y cuyes.
 
Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos y alimento para todos sus animales. 

Su meta es agrandar su negocio realizando galpones más grandes para la crianza de pollos.
texts.en:
Aurelia is on her second loan with the Sector 3 Marías communal bank. She lives in the Turi parish in Cuenca. "Turi" come from the indigenous word "kuri", which means "gold". It has the characteristics of a typical rural communities of the region: a plaza, a church, and buildings that are worth visiting for their architectural beauty. Its people still keep the flames of their culture and tradition alive. 

Aurelia is married and 42 years old. They have six children, aged 21, 18, 15, 14, 9, and 4. They oldest three work and do distance learning. her fourth, a daughter goes to high school, her fifth, a son is going to a local elementary school, and her youngest is at home. Her husband is a driver and they house they live in is the fruit of their marriage. 

Aurelia spends most of her time caring for her family. To contribute to her family's finances, she cultivates her land. She sells the vegetables  she harvests and also raises animals such as cows, chickens and guinea pigs.
 
She is going to invest in buying chickens and feed for all of her animals. Her goal is to enlarge her business by making bigger sheds to raise chickens in.

loans.use: to buy chickens and feed for her animals.

loans.name: Viviana De Jesús

texts.es:
La Señora. Viviana es una socia alegre, carismática y participativa que se encuentre realizando su segundo crédito en el banco comunal Sector 3 Marías, vive por el sector de la Virgen de Bronce en la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que goza de un clima frió, su ciudad se mezcla entre lo colonial y lo moderno, su gente es cálida y amable.

La Señora Viviana tiene 35 años de edad, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 13, 12, 10 y 9 años de edad, dos de sus hijos están en el colegio y dos en la escuela. Su esposo labora como carpintero, la casa en la que viven es arrendada.

Doña Viviana a mas de pasar en casa cuidando sus hijos trabaja en la venta de cosméticos de varias marcas, esta actividad la desempeña desde hace 3 años, sus productos los vende recorriendo la ciudad de lunes a viernes sin un horario fijo, también tres días a la semana trabaja como empleada domestica solo medio día. 

Su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cosméticos de oferta para incrementar su negocio. 

Su meta es tener un local propio para vender sus productos.
texts.en: Viviana is a happy, charismatic and active member who is taking out her second loan with the Sector 3 Marías community bank. She lives in the Virgen de Bronce sector of the city of Cuenca, a city which enjoys a cool climate. The city is a mixture of the colonial and the modern, and its people are warm and friendly. Viviana is 35 years old, married and has four children, ages 13, 12, 10 and 9. All four go to school. Her husband is a carpenter, and they rent their home. To spend more time at home caring for her children, Viviana has worked selling various brands of cosmetics for the past three years. She sells her products throughout the city Monday through Friday and doesn't have a fixed schedule, and three times a week she works as a maid for half the day. She plans to use the loans to purchase cosmetics to expand her business. Her goal is to have her own store to sell her products.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Rosa Maclovia

texts.es:
La Señora. Rosa se encuentra en el cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal Sector 3 Marías, vive por una comunidad que es perteneciente a la parroquia de Turi en Cuenca, Turi viene del vocablo indígena "kuri" que significa oro, tiene la conformación típica de los asentamientos rurales de la región: la presencia de la plaza, la iglesia y las edificaciones ubicadas en torno a los hitos urbanos son dignos de visitar, por su belleza arquitectónica, su gente aun mantienen vivas las llamas de sus culturas y tradiciones.

Doña Rosa tiene 40 años de edad, está casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 4 hijos de 20, 17, 16 y 14 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos trabajan, le ayudan  económicamente y estudian en un colegio a distancia, sus dos últimos hijos solo se dedica a estudiar en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como empleado privado, la casa en la que viven es de propiedad conyugal.

Ella se dedica a la limpieza de diferentes casas en las que trabaja todos los días, en su casa se dedica a la cría y venta de  Chanchos, gallinas, cuyes y pollos, también cultiva sus terrenos y lo que cosecha es para el consumo de su hogar. 

Su crédito anterior lo invirtio en la construcción de una chanchera para crecer en su negocio y realizo todos los pagos en las fechas indicadas. Esta repitiendo el crédito ya que quierfe comprar pollos y alimento para todos sus animales. 

Su meta es tener más animales para la venta.
texts.en:
Rosa is on her fourth loan with the "Sector 3 Maria" communal bank.  She lives in a community belonging to Turi Parish in Cuenca. Turi comes from the indigenous word "kuri" which means gold. It has a structure typical of the rural settlements in the region: the presence of a plaza and church, and the buildings are located around urban landmarks; they are worthy of a visit. Because of its architectural beauty, its people still keep alive the flames of the culture and traditions. 

Rosa is 40 years old and married. She has four children, ages 20, 17, 16, and 14. Her two oldest children work, help her financially, and study in a school with distance learning. Her youngest two children are studying at a school in the city. Her husband works as a private employee. They share the house in which they live.

She cleans houses for a living, working every day of the week. At home, she raises and sells pigs, hens, guinea pigs, and chickens. She also cultivates the land and what she harvests is used for food at home. 

She is taking another loan because she wants to buy chickens and feed for all of her animals. 

She invested her previous loan in the construction of a pigpen in order to grow her business. She made all of her payments on the designated days. Her goal is to have more animals in order to sell.

loans.use: to buy chickens and animal feed.

loans.name: Lucia Magdalena

texts.es:
La Señora Lucia se encuentra reingresando al banco comunal Feria Libre ya que anteriormente ha formado parte del banco comunal por 3 años, vive por la parroquia de Ricuarte en la ciudad de Cuenca, Ricuarte es una parroquia que se destaca por su sabor ya que preparan los más ricos platos típicos, su gente es amable, gentil y mantienen su costumbres, cuenta con varios lugares para admirar la belleza de sus paisajes y disfrutar de momentos de sano esparcimiento.

La Señora Lucia tiene 27 años, es casada y en su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 9, 6 y 1 año de edad, sus dos primeros hijos estudian en una escuelita de la ciudad. Su esposo es de profesión chofer y ofrece sus servicios en el transporte público, la casa en la que viven es arrendada.

Ella labora en una fábrica de juguetes, trabaja de lunes a viernes desde las 7 de la mañana hasta las 4 de la tarde, en su casa se dedica pintar y vender cerámicas y así ayudar a su esposo con los gastos de su hogar.

Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de cerámica. 

Su meta es agrandar su negocio.
texts.en: Lucia is rejoining the Feria Libre community bank, which she had previously been with for three years. She lives in the parish of Ricuarte in the city of Cuenca. Ricuarte is known for its flavorful food since they prepare the richest traditional meals, and the people are friendly and maintain their customs. There are various places where one can admire the beauty of the countryside and enjoy some quiet moments. Lucia is 27 years old, married and has three children, ages 9, 6 and 1. Her oldest two children go to school in town. Her husband is a professional driver in public transportation. They rent their home. Lucia works at a toy factory Monday through Friday from 7 a.m. to 4 p.m. At home, she dedicates herself to painting and selling ceramics to help her husband with household expenses. She plans to use the loan to purchase ceramics, and her goal is to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ceramics.

loans.name: Solomon

texts.en: Solomon, 49 years old, is married and has six children. He lives in the forest region of Isabela. He has managed a farm for eight years.
